title: The Peremptory President: Stop Right There, Sugar - Novel Updates
author: 夏雪儿
description: She betrayed herself of her own accord in order to save her critically ill mother, but accidentally provoked a big shot—he was cold, abstinent and unfeeling, but went crazy only for her... She thought that his getting close to her was just another game of the rich, but he unexpectedly showered her with love and affection. Because of him, she finally mustered up courage to go all out and love again. However, it turned out that everything was less of a pleasure than she had imagined...>
